name: Nesli Erdogmus
content: Nesli Erdoğmuş (on leave) - Computer Engineering Department Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Search Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Home About People Research Research Focus Projects Publications Collaborations Education Undergraduate Program MS Programs CENG MS Program SEDS MS Program PhD Program Minor Program Contact lidya multisite > Computer Engineering Department > Nesli Erdoğmuş (on leave) Nesli Erdoğmuş (on leave) Nesli Erdoğmuş (on leave) Assistant Professor Assistant Professor Nesli Erdoğmuş received her B.S. and M.S degrees from the Electrical and Electronics Department of Middle East Technical University. After completing her Ph.D. studies at EURECOM Sophia-Antipolis, France and graduating from Télécom ParisTech, she did a two-year post-doc at Idiap in Switzerland. In 2014, she was awarded scholarship via a TUBITAK BIDEB project and she joined IZTECH Computer Engineering Department in 2014 as a researcher. Later in 2016, she started as an assistant professor in the same department. In the CSIGB research group that she founded in parallel to her field of interest, research is mainly conducted on face and fingerprint recognition.
